org.dellroad.stuff.vaadin22.data

Class VaadinSessionDataProvider<T extends SessionInfo>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.vaadin.flow.data.provider.AbstractDataProvider<T,SerializablePredicate<T>>
      • com.vaadin.flow.data.provider.ListDataProvider<T>
        • org.dellroad.stuff.vaadin22.data.AsyncDataProvider<T>
          • org.dellroad.stuff.vaadin22.data.VaadinSessionDataProvider<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConfigurableFilterDataProvider<T,SerializablePredicate<T>,SerializablePredicate<T>>, DataProvider<T,SerializablePredicate<T>>, InMemoryDataProvider<T>, Serializable

    public class VaadinSessionDataProvider<T extends SessionInfo>
extends AsyncDataProvider<T>
    A DataProvider that provides an object corresponding to each live VaadinSession.

    The sessions are retrieved from the SimpleSpringServlet, which must be configured with session tracking enabled.

    Sessions are represented by SessionInfo, which may be subclassed to add application-specific information (e.g., currently logged-in user).

    Sessions are orderded by reverse creation time (newest first).

    See Also:
    SimpleSpringServlet, Serialized Form

      • servlet

    • Constructor Detail

      • VaadinSessionDataProvider

        public VaadinSessionDataProvider(Function<? super VaadinSession,T> infoCreator)
        Constructor.

        The infoCreator gathers whatever information is needed by this instance from the given session, and may assume that the given session is locked.

        If infoCreator returns null, that session is omitted.

        Caller still must configure an async executor via setAsyncExecutor().

        Parameters:
        infoCreator - extracts data provider information from each session
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if there is no current VaadinSession associated with the current thread
        IllegalArgumentException - if the associated VaadinService is not a VaadinServletService
        IllegalArgumentException - if the associated VaadinServlet is not a SimpleSpringServlet
        IllegalArgumentException - if infoCreator is null

      • VaadinSessionDataProvider

        public VaadinSessionDataProvider(Function<? super Runnable,? extends Future<?>> executor,
                                 Function<? super VaadinSession,T> infoCreator)
        Constructor.

        The infoCreator gathers whatever information is needed by this instance from the given session, and may assume that the given session is locked.

        If infoCreator returns null, that session is omitted.

        Parameters:
        executor - the executor used to execute async load tasks
        infoCreator - extracts data provider information from each session
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if there is no current VaadinSession associated with the current thread
        IllegalArgumentException - if the associated VaadinService is not a VaadinServletService
        IllegalArgumentException - if the associated VaadinServlet is not a SimpleSpringServlet
        IllegalArgumentException - if infoCreator is null

    • Method Detail

      • reload

        public void reload()
        Load or reload this data provider.

        If there is already an async load in progress, this method will cancel() it first. You can check this ahead of time via AsyncDataProvider.isBusy().

        Parameters:
        executor - asynchronous executor
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if executor is null
        IllegalArgumentException - if executor returns a null Future
        IllegalStateException - if this instance is already in the process of reloading
        IllegalStateException - if this instance's VaadinSession is not locked

      • getItems

        public List<T> getItems()
        Get the SessionInfo's currently in this container.
        Overrides:
        getItems in class ListDataProvider<T extends SessionInfo>

      • getId

        public String getId(T item)

        The implementation in VaadinSessionDataProvider returns item.getVaadinSession().getSession().getId().

      • buildSessionList

        protected List<T> buildSessionList()
                            throws InterruptedException
        Build the list of sessions.

        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if any session lock is held
        InterruptedException
